<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 211 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Ritualist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=260)

**Prerequisites**
[Ritualist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6388)

</column>

---

You can cast difficult [rituals](Rituals.aspx)  that might otherwise be just beyond your skill. You can attempt checks to cast a ritual that requires expert proficiency if you are trained, master proficiency if you are an expert, or legendary proficiency if you are a master.
